result.title: Stalker NPC Pack
result.description:
Large pack of NPCs from the game S.T.A.L.K.E.R

- There are 45 NPCs in the pack.

Presented by:
- Groups: Duty, freedom, monolith, scientists, bandits, mercenaries, clear sky, loners, military.
- Special: O-consciousness, Bartender, Sidorovich, swordsman, wolf, doctor, rookie.
- Monsters: Zombie, bloodsucker, burer, controller, snark.

result.title: Big pack of weapons from Block Strike
result.description:
Big pack of weapons from Block Strike!

The package contains:
• AK-47 Marshmall
• AK-47 Standard
• AK-47 Dissaray
• A1M1
• AUG Diablo (+ regular version)
• Ultrasound Enlix (+ regular version)
• USP Greendawn Pistol (+Neoplex skin, regular version)
• Gun Glock Galactik (+ skin Nezzle, normal version
• Five Seven Neo (+regular version)
• Pistol Beretta Imperial Dragon (+ regular version)

From melee weapons:
• Ke rambit Elite Coloring
• Karambit Over Flow
• Karambit Cristal Carruphion
• Katana Emerald (+ regular version)
• Ordinary knife Fake Gold (+ skin Opium, regular version)

Notes:
• Melee weapons cannot cut
• Beautiful
• Weapons can shoot
• Weapons and knives can be picked up
